MajorClaims.MC1: type of temper and advantages of individual work are the most persuasive arguments in favor of studying alone

Claims.C1: my productivity boosts when style of work is appropriate with my type of temper
Claims.C2: working alone allows me to avoid spending time and efforts on many things that are an integral part of teamwork

Premises.P1: Being by nature introvert, I have to spend much time and efforts on adjusting to surroundings and especially new people
Premises.P2: Once, when I was working on presentation with strangers, I sat aside and so prepared more than half of work myself instead of making attempts to get acquainted with unknown people
Premises.P3: I must not divide tasks and duties between team members, share responsibility and benefits, and spend time on teambuilding
Premises.P4: These advantages are especially important in situations of shortage of time
Premises.P5: About a year ago I was lucky to become a participant of student brainstorming game
Premises.P6: To my rivals' surprise, being the only member of my own "team" I gained a victory
